function.name: str_replace_editor

content:
The file /workspace/sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py has been edited. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of /workspace/sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py:
   766	    >>> nthroot_mod(68, 3, 109)
   767	    23
   768	    """
   769	    from sympy.core.numbers import igcdex
   770	    a, n, p = as_int(a), as_int(n), as_int(p)
   771	    # if a is divisible by p then x = 0 is a solution modulo prime p
   772	    if a % p == 0:
   773	        if all_roots:
   774	            return [0]
   775	        else:
   776	            return 0
   777	    if n == 2:
   778	        return sqrt_mod(a, p, all_roots)
   779	    # see Hackman "Elementary Number Theory" (2009), page 76
   780	    if not is_nthpow_residue(a, n, p):
   781	        return None
   782	    if not isprime(p):
   783	        raise NotImplementedError("Not implemented for composite p")
   784	
Review the changes and make sure they are as expected. Edit the file again if necessary.

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py
+++ /workspace/sympy/sympy/ntheory/residue_ntheory.py
@@ -770,0 +771,6 @@
+    # if a is divisible by p then x = 0 is a solution modulo prime p
+    if a % p == 0:
+        if all_roots:
+            return [0]
+        else:
+            return 0
